data.text:
Winners of the intl. call for science #doc projects were announced at #WCSFP22’s United We Stand session: 

🔹The Lost Wonders of the World: In Search of the Hanging Babylon, Lion TV
🔹 Destination Moon, ZED
🔹 The Forest, Windfall Films

Read more: https://t.co/J9x1AhU4fl https://t.co/GRcif5rwsU

“We want to collaborate to compete.” Discussing the power of collaboration at United We Stand Session! #WCSFP22

7 public broadcasters join their creative & financial forces to fund 3 blue chip science #docs https://t.co/HTy8rWshuG

More movers & shakers connect during #WCSFP22! Independent producers met one-on-one w/ decision makers during our incredible Speed Dating sessions. 

#filmmaking #producer #science #factual https://t.co/jTgODaRqk9
Thank you, @SouleadoEnt and @rachiejob, for sharing your #WCSFP22 experience!

data.text: RT @TonyLeeMoral: Don’t miss Little Gems at 11am today at the World Congress of Science and Nature Producers @wcsfp where director @JosefGa…

We hope you had a great day on Day 3 of #WCSFP22 yesterday—here are some highlights!

On this final day, we have two sessions: "United We Stand" at 9:30 am & "Little Gem" at 11 am. 

At 1 pm, join us to celebrate this year's winners of The Buzzies and Congress's 30th anniversary! https://t.co/PXO4LzMn5a
RT @lilimedialab: ✨Another incredible day at #WCSFP22. @aliyajasmine and @AlizaSovani were busy at @WCSFP taking meetings & attending sessi…
🎤 Sweet Caroline—ba, ba, ba! #WCSFP22 https://t.co/fmP0S0Oz5p
SANTA? #KaraokeNight https://t.co/xMiRdnRgYa

RT @TheNickyHawkins: “It’s about connection. That’s us at our best.” 

Fantastic to hear the inspiring @lizbonnin talk climate and nature s…
RT @rachiejob: A few brilliant days in sunny (yes it was!) Glasgow talking factual TV @WCSFP Great to be back and my first time with @all3m…

Another busy session! 

“We should never underestimate the intelligence of our viewers.” Currently discussing genre bending programming, audiences & finding new perspectives. 

Sponsored by @Francetele https://t.co/ikodoY4DkN
An inspiring and eye-opening session on environmental programming and the climate crises.

“We feel inspired when we’re together. We can do anything when we’re together. Let’s show programs about that… The real power lies at the community level… That is where the hope is.” — Liz Bonnin ends on a hopeful note.

“I don’t think environmental programming and the crises we face, that’s scientifically proven, should be privy to the same impartiality rules…the facts are irrefutable.” — @lizbonnin

Another incredible session! https://t.co/W0Td1fypNF
“We don’t have any time left. COP27 made it very clear.” — some real talk in Liz Bonnin’s Spark of Inspiration session.
@meetglasgow, @tracedominguez, @marenhunsberger, @lilimedialab, @limonerofilms, @Constababble, thank you for sharing your experience!

“Wars are happening all the time, you wonder why we’re still fascinated by war documentaries. But there’s a deep need to understand why humans are doing this to each other and to themselves… But this way, we can examine it.” — Film to Phones: Evolution of the War Documentary. https://t.co/J5jz3FEUbM
RT @SouleadoEnt: Another great session this morning ⁦@WCSFP⁩ https://t.co/60oUFWZrJV
Be sure to check out the VR Experience: Gaudi, the Workshop of the Divine happening on the upper floor—on until 6:30 PM today! #WCSFP22 https://t.co/CQ7nOSrzZ6

“Don’t think of your film as something you’re going to sell to one broadcaster. There’s so many different avenues... It’s not going to be a one-stop-shop.” — Great questions & great discussion at The Changing Role of Distributors. #WCSFP22 https://t.co/oNr3UuKWg3

“Please start conversations outside of your bubbles… find different mediums; children’s books, podcasts, VR. You don’t have to be an expert in these things. It’s about finding the right partners… We all have stories.” ➡️ The Planet’s Dying, So What?
“Connecting human health to the climate crisis is definitely a way to reach people…” Great discussion during The Planet’s Dying, So What? https://t.co/JNOAGsymY0
Top of the morning to ya! #WCSFP22 https://t.co/m34HiD8u31

urls.title: Registered attendees
urls.description: Prepare to be wowed! After popular museum showings in Europe, Gedeon's latest VR experience, Gaudi, the Workshop of the Divine, is coming to Congress. Don't miss this playful and spectacular experience. Want to pre-book an experience? Contact us at alecuivre@gedeonprogrammes.com. In 2026 we will celebrate the 100th anniversary of the death of Antoni Gaudí, the most famous architect in Spain and undoubtedly one of the most important of the modern era. Through his work, but also through his revolutionary methods, Gaudi has left a deep imprint on the city of Barcelona, but also on the history of architecture. With the experience Gaudi, the Workshop of the Divine, dive into the creative universe of the famous architect. By slipping into the costume of an assistant and guided by the voice of the master himself, discover Gaudi's workshop and the secrets of his know-how with the goal of understanding his extraordinary personality in order to take over and complete, when the time comes, the mo

data.text:
While you're at the Congress, don't miss "Gaudi, the Workshop of the Divine," the latest VR experience by @GEDEONGROUP with @Small_MacGuff!

Head over to M2 between 9:30 am and 6:30 pm today to try it out: https://t.co/VcnC8zxAVj https://t.co/NxuHAZyhCl

What a night! Here are the highlights from Day Two of #WCSFP22.

Today's first sessions—"New Visions & Stories" and "Lights, Camera, Technology"—start at 9 am, so get ready and head to the SEC Centre! https://t.co/i8LodjnFHX

🪩 Turn up #WCSFP22! We danced our hearts out under the famous arches of @PLATFORMgla to celebrate Congress & the BBC's 100th anniversary!

Hosted by @bbcstudios https://t.co/lY4cDVDz96

How to stand out: “It’s all about the starting point. You need to have either CCTV, home video, audio that’s not been heard before, a police interview that’s not been seen before… That’s the expectation now for commissioners…” 

#TrueCrime #scicomms #WCSFP22 https://t.co/hdra8kuFBT
Thanks for sharing your experience, @SouleadoEnt & @brandyyanchyk!

🌊 GOING DEEP: What a session! This group of chuckling adventurers discussed their new & daring expeditions. Who here was able to catch the session?

Session sponsored by NHK @NHKWORLD_News https://t.co/xZ8s8cX2Aj

🚀 The charismatic & talented Dr. Maggie Aderin-Pocock shares her incredible accomplishments, dreams & her passion for science with us in another packed & vibrant session, Spark of Inspiration: Reaching for the Stars.

Keep hustling, Doc. https://t.co/jhbhtiKY5t

You’re looking at the next generation of science & factual creators ✨ Be sure to say hey to our Emerging Producers during #WCSFP22! 

Bursary program sponsored by @Cineflix 

#contentcreator #scicomms #Filmmaking https://t.co/LZu56Ydmd7

(I wasn’t supposed to…
RT @sabrinalyli: Great time speaking to science documentary producers 🎥 @WCSFP Ideas Salon along with other emerging scientists such as @Mo…

Industry insiders discuss what working for the BBC has meant to them ➡️ “It was the hardest place to work and it was the best place to work… I came out so incredibly well trained.” — @FatimaSalaria https://t.co/jSHCgMRtIF

WTF is your digital strategy? We discuss the complex web, content creators & the digital universe in this packed session. 

Sponsored by @cbcdocs https://t.co/0J62I2QUx2
…and then the more investigative, hard-hitting documentaries on the polluters…& the misinformation that’s manipulating world opinion.”— @gordonjbuchanan
“This year [environmental programming] broke down into two main categories: the epic big-budget specials that showcased the beauty, the diversity of the planet…

“While we’ve seen dark visions of both the future & the past in science programs this year, we’ve also been lucky enough to witness some of the biggest & most inspiring science discoveries happening right now.”

RT @Constababble: Stoked that the Tardis made an appearance at World Congress of Science and Factual Producers!

#WCSFP22 @WCSFP https://t.…

“Your ambition continues to grow as the number of platforms expands...This year we saw more programs crossing more platforms than ever before, a mash-up of digital & gaming, virtual reality & immersive museum displays, live broadcasts running alongside social media.”—Dr Ikharia

“People are generally comfortable with the status quo, so as a doctor, tv presenter and educator with a lived experience, issues around racism, gender, sexuality, privilege and access, have always been very close to my heart.” — Dr. Ronx Ikharia

“Living a lie has been a sad reality for so many in society who’ve suffered from discrimination, oppression or been shoved to the fringes of society…While racism hasn’t disappeared our conversation it has become more honest, more real & more inclusive.” — @Mobeen_Azhar

“The conflict [in Ukarine] sent political and economic shock waves around the world…. No longer just historical black and white images from another era…. Ukraine has brought a new relevance to war…and documentaries about war.” — Ella Al-Shamahi
What’s the Buzz is kicking off soon to showcase our annual round-up of the hottest new trends and most buzzworthy factual content! https://t.co/mW5RhP6brQ

tweets.text:
The week at @WCSFP was a great reminder of the huge global community of science communicators, factual producers and on-screen presenters that I am lucky to be a part of.

It was so good to reconnect with people and to meet so many for the first time too! https://t.co/zrcRZa8eW9

⚡️ It's been a fascinating four days at #WCSFP22 with an incredible slate of sessions and distinguished speakers from the science and factual production community.

Screen Scotland is proud to have been this year's Signature Partner 🎬 https://t.co/jlD8geNlBI

Walter, our CEO and founder, got the @WCSFP  #lifetimeachievementaward in Factual Content. "Many people feel disconnected from #nature. That's why our industry must do better. We need to change the narrative and make everyone aware that our #planet is not eternal." -Walter Köhler https://t.co/AeLePG3Iiw

What a brilliant week in Glasgow at #wcsfp2022 connecting with creatives from all over the world and forging new ideas in doc and factual content eg this global doc initiative #documentary 👌 https://t.co/kWs2ZMwefG

3. I've been in Scotland this week for @WCSFP!!! It has been a shockingly transformative few days, mostly because the people I met are wildly inspirational (like these fine folks! 👇)
https://t.co/8DvM6pMcZu
Thanks so much for this! World Science Congress was a blast this year! https://t.co/90RW5440LK

@WCSFP @CuriosityStream What an honor! Thank you for recognizing all of the hard work this amazing team put forth! @visionhawkMT Special thanks to Jorge Franzini @CuriosityStream Casey Anderson @Grizanderson @JohnAnsotegui Eli Harris, Nate Kinney, Emma Lynn, & Chet Stephan.

Thank you!

@thecarbonmovie wins another great prize! Very proud to share the international “Green Impact of the Year Award” with the wonderful team at Handful of Films. Thanks Buzzie Awards, sorry I had to run to catch a flight!  What a lovely end to @WCSFP 2022. #sciconm #climate https://t.co/3p9ekQNNkz
